attributes.action: Lower the percentage on high tax bracket form 40%
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should people who have worked hard to get a good job be taxed more than somebody who has not bothered to put in that effort? This is giving out the wrong impression to the younger generation.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/tax-brackets/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
